title: Retro Blast II - Game Music Pack
description: Compiled exclusively for Arcade, Racing, Retro and Rhythm games, Retro Blast II comes back is a game music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From normal aliens who want to save a virtual world, to talking pixels who wear the coolest jackets. Retro Blast II comes back again to empower those stories that we all love.


– Listen to this Soundtrack Pack here.


About Soundtrack Pack Artist:

This soundtrack pack contains music from my previous artistic name, Bitonal Landscape. Enjoy!


  •  Sound Great in Any Device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered so they sound great in any device that your game is played.
  •  Avoid Incongruent Volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered to reach a fully congruent volume within the full soundtrack.
  • Repeat Music Seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, so you can repeat the music in the game seamlessly. 


Number of Audio Wavs: 19

Number of Audio Cues: 19

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 44.1kHz / 24bit

Does music loop: Yes
technicalDetails:
Features:


  •  Sound Great in Any Device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered so they sound great in any device that your game is played.
  •  Avoid Incongruent Volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered to reach a fully congruent volume within the full soundtrack.
  • Repeat Music Seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, so you can repeat the music in the game seamlessly. 


Number of Audio Wavs: 19

Number of Audio Cues: 19

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 44.1kHz / 24bit

Does music loop: Yes






Supported Development Platforms:


Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Documentation: https://youtu.be/f7fGVpqDV2Q


Additional Notes:


About Composer:


Lufus is a music producer, composer (formerly known as Bitonal Landscape) who has made the Original Soundtrack of multi-million games like:


– Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)

– Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)

– Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads)


Support & Help:


If you need help downloading this soundtrack/music pack, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
